subject: Update claude.md with accurate stats and missing features
body:
- Update module count: ~35 → ~40 modules
- Update line count: ~12,000 → ~28,000 lines
- Remove reference to non-existent IMPLEMENTATION_ROADMAP.md
- Remove obsolete "13 phases completed" claim
- Add Options Overview feature documentation
- Add Compare Mode feature documentation
- Add USAGE_SCENARIOS_REVIEW.md to file structure
